review_details: Great ambient, nice view, service was fast. The food was fresh & tasty. The fish was super fresh. Thank you for the great time.

Amazing trip to Polyaigos Island. Its the most beautiful place I have ever seen. All shades of blue, and crystal clear waters. The host were perfection, Nikos & his wife were a dream come true. Great food, freshly caught. The best hospitality. Thank you for the trip ill remember for ever. Positive vibes!
Amazing trip thank you!!! Rhenia was beautiful, crystal blue waters. Great food & wine. Amazing trip to delos island. Mystical energy and place to visit!!!

Great location, near all major attractions, clean, and most importantly amazing staff!!! Super helpful with any needs you may have, suggestions, and always just a step Away. Thanks for the great stay! I will deffinitely be back.
